metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7957 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
XStream through 1.4.9, when a certain denyTypes workaround is not used, mishandles attempts to create an instance of the primitive type 'void' during unmarshalling, leading to a remote application crash, as demonstrated by an xstream.fromXML("<void/>") call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7957` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxstream-java - 1.4.8-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxstream-java package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.8-1ubuntu0.1').
